pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, January 11, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Italy, Giuseppe Conte.

9:35 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the One Planet Summit.

To watch the event, viewers can register via the following link: https://oneplanetsummit2021.site.calypso-event.net/en/.
